trans-unit.source: Provides information data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand" /> event of an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> 事件提供信息数据。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 用于在宿主环境中进行操作。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />；权限值：<see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />。

trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs.ListItem" /> 属性。

trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The original arguments inherited from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 继承自 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs" /> 对象的原始参数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: The item and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> parameters initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> properties with their respective values.
trans-unit.target: 项和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>参数初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>具有其各自的值的属性。

trans-unit.source: The `originalArgs` parameter allows you to pass in a set of command arguments, which is useful for handling bubbled events.
trans-unit.target: `originalArgs`参数使你可以传递的命令参数的一组可用于处理冒泡的事件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the control that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: 返回引发事件的控件。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: The control that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件的控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the default command.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置默认命令的名称。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: When set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> attempts to render a shortcut to invoke the default command.
trans-unit.target: 设置时，<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>尝试呈现的快捷方式来调用默认命令。

trans-unit.source: In HTML, the default rendering in `ListView` displays the first field as a link to the `DetailsView` of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>.
trans-unit.target: 在 HTML 中中的默认呈现`ListView`指向链接的形式显示的第一个字段`DetailsView`的<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>。

trans-unit.source: By setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs.DefaultCommand> property, clicking the link invokes the default command.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs.DefaultCommand>属性后，单击该链接时，将调用的默认命令。

trans-unit.source: Invoking the default command raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand> event.
trans-unit.target: 调用的默认命令引发<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandName%2A> of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs> object is set to the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs.DefaultCommand> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Command.CommandName%2A>的<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs>对象设置的值为<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs.DefaultCommand>属性。

trans-unit.source: Even if a default command is defined, you should include a command with the same name in the commands collection.
trans-unit.target: 即使定义的默认命令，你应在命令集合包含具有相同名称的命令。

trans-unit.source: If the control cannot render a graphical element that includes a shortcut for the default command, the default command is still available through the rendering of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件无法呈现图形元素，其中包含的默认命令的快捷方式，则默认命令是仍可通过的呈现<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list item that generated the event.
trans-unit.target: 返回生成了事件的列表项。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: The list item that generated the event.
trans-unit.target: 生成事件的列表项。
